website_summaries.verdict: A great gift for elementary school-aged kids, especially those who don't like typical toys.
pros: This smart watch for kids can be used as a watch, but also includes 2 cameras to take videos and photos, games, a pedometer, and sound effects
The watch is rechargeable and hold 1,600 photos or 11 one-minute videos
Additional games can be purchased, too
cons: The games are ideal for kids ages 5 to 8
Kids older than that may get bored

customer_reviews.title: they love the fact that they can take videos as well ...
customer_reviews.text: i gave these watches to my nieces...6 and 8. they went wild over them! they love the fact that they can take videos as well as pictures. there are some games that can be played and the pictures that are taken can be uploaded to a computer. this particular watch came with two watch bands so the sisters were each able to wear a different one to tell their watches apart. the clock face can be changed. the watch is not water-proof...which would be a great feature for children...but other than that, the watch was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Love the Lake

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this for any age appropriate little one
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for a gift. She loves it and can’t put it down. She likes the games, telling everybody what time it is, taking pictures of everyone and everything, and counting her steps. Would recommend this for any age appropriate little one. She has tiny arms and it fits her decently, a little big but she doesn’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J.

customer_reviews.title: NO REPLACEMENT BAND
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these for our children for Christmas. It is mid-January now & our oldest child who takes the best care of his things has broken both watchbands for his watch. Because I know it wasn't negligence on his part I am willing to buy another band, but can not find one. After digging, my understanding is that they do not make or offer replacement bands. Isn't this especially strange since this watch comes with 2 bands?? The watch itself is great, but useless without a band. This is my first 1-star review.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd vtech smart watch I've purchased. Each year they get progressively better. My older kids always loved theirs but this one i bought for my daughter turning 5. It has a selfie camera!!! Ohhhhhhh this is amazing! Her sisters are jealous of her watch. Lol. it is thinner than theirs and speaks the time (which the older watches did not). Very very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina M. Rusek

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter for her birthday and she loves it very nice smartwatch for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for her birthday and she loves it very nice smartwatch for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very easy to charge and use
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for each of my daughters (ages 9 and 6) for Christmas. They are very easy to charge and use! They loved them! They can take photos and videos and lots of fun games and apps to play with. It's not a smart phone by any means, but for this little watch, it makes it feel like a smartphone for my kids. They are enjoying them! And it's helping them tell time.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: This is great for young kids
customer_reviews.text: This is great for young kids, but the graphics are just terrible. They are not very good quality so the kid gets bored with it easily. It's a good concept but with the technology today and with the quality kids are used to, they are going to hate this. My brother held it for 2 days then asked for an Apple watch ha!
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Great activity watch
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves this watch. There are so many activities on it, and some that even get him moving (running, jumping). My only complaint, and it will be solved when he gets a bit older with it, is the games do not give much time for him to figure him out. By the time he works out what he needs to do, it's making him restart. Especially the mouse game. I've sat with it a few times and struggled to get the cheese and keys in time. Can be frustrating for him, but I figure he will get better as he gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy and gives incentives to be active.
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old son loves this! He's had so much fun (and exercise) running around catching monsters and playing the other games. The camera isn't the best quality, but he loves to pretend he's a spy and has fun snapping photos with it.
customer_reviews.author: Photochic

customer_reviews.title: Good Pretend Smartwatch for Kids Under 9-Years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for my 8 -year -old grandson and 6-year-old granddaughter. They like their new smart watches to the extent that my daughter needs to occasionally give their watches some “break time.” I was concerned that the 8-year -old might think the watch was too babyish, however, he has a lot of fun with it. The activities are quite limited but you can download a few more games from the Vtech site. There is no WiFi which is a downfall and it’s not that straight forward to navigate the downloads. I would rate this 5 stars if it included some way communicate with parents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but my daughter really wanted a smart watch that replaced her kid fitbit
customer_reviews.text: The pedometer is not accurate and requires the move application to be turned on and reset manaully. Ok if you just want games, but my daughter really wanted a smart watch that replaced her kid fitbit. We returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Dead weight after two months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my child six-seven months ago. She enjoyed it very much for about two months. She’d complained about it behaving erratically and left it alone for a while. When she made an attempt to charge and wear it again after about 1-2 weeks, the thing didn’t even turn on. I charged it for her and monitored it for about an hour and nothing happened. It was like it received no power. Charged it overnight (about 12 hours) and got no response. Charged it on various outlets and still no change. So, it’s a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Taktishun

customer_reviews.title: 2 broken bands in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter got this watch for her birthday at the end of April 2020. It is now the beginning of June now & the two wrist bands that the watch came with have broken. There is a plastic clamp that holds the wristband in place & is supposed to make it easy to switch between different bands. It is poorly constructed & snapped off when we were attempting to change the band. Twice. It would make more sense to make that connection piece metal. Now we are trying to come up with another option because I can’t find a replacement band by VTech.
customer_reviews.author: K. White

customer_reviews.title: Horrible bands that break easily
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute watch and helps my daughter tell time. She likes to wear it at school and play her little games. BUT the interchangeable bands suck really bad. I warn you all they will break easily. My daughter broke both that came with within 4 months. The cheap plastic clip brakes easily. Customer service is really bad, just keeps giving me the runaround, buy another watch he says. If it breaks you CANNOT buy a replacement band. Not even eBay sells them...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features, even for a 9 or 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was too childish/not age appropriate being 4 and up but my 9 year old insisted on getting it last Christmas. Wow. Lots of features and it has still held her attention after a year. She dove in and figured everything out on her own. It is still going strong after 1 year. I recommended it to a friend with a 6 year old boy and he has enjoyed it. It takes a little longer to figure out but it's kinda of cool to see him discover new things about the watch every so often. This was a great deal with the extra band. Mine was the violet/floral edition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4eva

customer_reviews.title: Lots of activities to do on this watch!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old and 6 year old Grand kids LOVE these watches. It keeps them busy and active for hours. They got them for Christmas and still finding new games to play. The best feature is the camera/video. They LOVE taking pictures and movies!!
customer_reviews.author: Mec

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea for a child to use, with so many features....IF IT WORKED!! I purchased TWO of these watches for my grandsons for their birthday. Unfortunately, the battery doesn’t last more than a few minutes, the stem on the side of the watch is constantly getting stuck when pressed, and the alarm never worked. For the price, this should not happen. I am extremely disappointed and would never recommend anyone to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Guinnea P.

customer_reviews.title: It came with the screen completely detached
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with the screen detached from the motherboard. I had to reconnect it and use some glue to keep the screen in place again. I bought another one for my other daughter, which died within a few hours of use. These smartwatches are a good idea, but this is a very low quality implementation.
customer_reviews.author: mavalosdittel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed... After having this watch for 1 month it is running very slow and the cover for the charging port is broke. I expected this watch to last considering its designed for children. Just wish products would do what they say and be strong for children.
customer_reviews.author: David Berryhill

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it, but...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a five star review if not for the poor design of the band. Using the watch with the supplied charger, it has functioned well. My daughter really likes it. Good thing that it came with an extra band though. The first one broke after about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Band Broke and Cannot be Replaced
customer_reviews.text: We bought this smart watch for my daughter's 6th birthday. She was so excited and it was definitely the favorite gift. Unfortunately both watchbands broke soon after purchasing. I just contacted vtech and since it has been more than 3 months they won't fix/replace. They do not sell bands by themselves so unfortunately it is now $50 trash!
customer_reviews.author: aflybutterfly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift for any child
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at much this watch could do! My 8yo granddaughter loved it! Very easy to figure out how to use & amount of pictures & video it can do is amazing considering price. My granddaughter loved recording herself singing & playing back. She played with it for hours before she even knew there were games too! I was on fence about purchasing it, but I'm so pleased I did. I recomend for any child boy or girl. Best gift I've ever bought her!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money - got for my 9 year old granddaughter - she lost interest very quickly and then it stopped working - oh well .....
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA LEROYER

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: "I love it's pedometer and that it has motion apps and the monster catcher game is exactly like Pokemon GO! It's little You-Run-I-Run Racing Run and You-Jump-I-Jump Funky Jump and You-Dance-I-Dance Crazy Dance, I love using that for home activity. It's so great and I want to give you guys money." - Actual review from my 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ELPIDIO S BUANTELLO

customer_reviews.title: Broken band
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9 year old daughter for Christmas. Now in February both bands have broken. They do not sell replacement bands and the bands are not covered in the warranty. It braking was DEFIANTLY not from overuse or poor handling. I'm not even sure she used it the whole month of January because of the first band braking and because we couldn't find where we put the replacements for a little while. The part that broke was the little piece that snaps down to secure the band. It's useless as a watch without bands.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas since she’s always ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas since she’s always playing with my Apple Watch. Thought she would be too young to understand but she uses it really well.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: For very young kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 year old son, its definitely geared toward little kids I'd say age 2-4ish
customer_reviews.author: Anne B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Screen and belt
customer_reviews.text: This review is more of the product I received. As can be seen belt is broken and actual screen too. Also on second belt in the package. This is going to be returned. But it really was disappointing as little one was waiting eagerly and when things arrive in this state you can imagine
customer_reviews.author: pjain

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my daughter for Christmas. She still plays with it. She loves it! She just turned 9. She has lost the names but she plays with the face part. It records. Has games and tells time. The closest she’ll get to an Apple Watch. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D.

customer_reviews.title: As expected and cute, but a bit boring
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but for kids it one of those gifts they love to receive but next thing you know the watch has been under the couch and unused for months. Too much technology available to kids for these to be exciting anymore
customer_reviews.author: Allina Diaz

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES this!! All he wanted for his birthday was a smartwatch and this definitely delivered!! The battery lasts plenty long, depending on how much he uses it. He loves taking pictures and filming. He also loves recording his voice and making it sound funny with the different voice changer things it has. Super cute little kids watch!
customer_reviews.author: Markelle

customer_reviews.title: This never worked took it to the cell phone store ...
customer_reviews.text: This never worked took it to the cell phone store for help but even they could not get this watch to work my daughter was so mad that the one gift she wanted most was a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Broke a week after they got for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: The home button got stuck completely not even a week after Christmas! It’s unusa now! My kids love it otherwise..
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: I like the product...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her watch. She plays on it often. It has games and the camera is entertaining. I wish that the movement it step count was more accurate. The bands seem to be cheaply made. I have already broken one after 2 months of use. All and all, we like the watch but I would buy something else if I had to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Built better than we expected
customer_reviews.text: Fun on sight and great camera resolution. Now it doesn’t keep my LOs attention for too long but she does like it when she uses it and honestly it’s better built than we expected. So, we are going to keep it an let her work up to it.
customer_reviews.author: PhatGyrl

customer_reviews.title: Fun but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is 8 loves the watch. I wish I had bought it closer to her birthday because the band that was on it broke within 4 days of her receiving it but I’ve missed the return window. She was careful with the watch as she’s wanted one for some time. It’s pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Renny

customer_reviews.title: Wristband breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Both wristbands that came with the watch broke within few months. I contacted VTech customer center and was told that they don't have a replacement. A replacement cannot be offered either because the warranty is only 3 months or 90 days from the date of purchase. It is one expensive toy that doesn't last long. It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: vtechuser

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift and I am hearing great feedback !! 6 y/o is enjoying the watch and it came with a second watch which she truly adores the watch does not just have games on it but also helps teach learning time. Another plus was for a non tech savy mom it was easy to set up. I say it was a hit !!
customer_reviews.author: SAVY BUYER

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can set parental controls on game time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these watches for our kids for Christmas and they haven't stopped playing with them since. As a parent, I love that you can set parental controls on game time. I also really like the creative games VTech developed to get kids physically moving and dancing. Our kids love all the games and the voice recording/video/selfie options ... especially the fun ways you can alter the sound and pictures. Really a great investment for $50.
customer_reviews.author: MarieJ

customer_reviews.title: I think all the good reviews are fake and this doesn't live up to ...
customer_reviews.text: We've bought this watch twice and it doesn't work. I think all the good reviews are fake and this doesn't live up to the usual Vtech standards.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Daryl Sawchuk

customer_reviews.title: favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: we own two of these and when I got this one It seemed to be a return or at least had been opened. Its a great toy and my boys have been using them for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and fun. Just don't know how to pass music from PC to the watch...
customer_reviews.text: My 9yo daughter loves this watch, it's comfortable for her to wear it, even for a whole day, she records herself on it, and plays games that it has, both the ones that it had from the manufacturer and ones that I downloaded for her. The only disadvantage, which could be just due to lack of reading and googling about the watch - I didn't find a way to pass songs (mp3, wav etc.) from the computer to the watch
customer_reviews.author: Hagai N.

customer_reviews.title: broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun watch, and my 8 year old daughter loved it. She enjoys the monster game and taking pictures and videos. I like the calendar and timers. Sadly, the watch broke about two weeks after the warranty expired, now I am feeling that it wasn't worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whiting

customer_reviews.title: These watches are the best for kids
customer_reviews.text: These watches are the best for kids. I bought a blue one for my son and a violet one for my daughter as Christmas gifts. They really love this watches.
customer_reviews.author: John Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: My boys both love this watch. Age 6 and age 9. I thought it would be too babyish for my 9 year old but he really enjoys it. If you are questioning if this is for younger kids, I recommend for ages up to 10.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Pirring

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was the most important thing that our granddaughter wanted for her 8th birthday, and she was thrilled. Of course her brother wanted a similar model for his 6th birthday a month later -- so that will be the next review I write!
customer_reviews.author: Doterling

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, Bands break and there's no replacements!
customer_reviews.text: Both bands broke and vtech can't and won't replace them because they don't offer replacement bands and its past the "warranty". So now I have a watch my daughter can't wear! They wouldn't even send me a different watch when I offered to send the one back I have.
customer_reviews.author: Brodi Schulz

customer_reviews.title: It was time...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson. He loved it. Once he realized it was similar to his mom's apple watch he was sold. It's a little advanced for him, but he can learn as he progresses. It has a variety of games and can take pictures
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Michelle

customer_reviews.title: My 8 yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas for him, he’s been asking for a smartwatch, I was only nervous that it’ll be “too kiddy” for him, but it isn’t at all, the games on it he seems to enjoy and the filters when he takes pictures, and lastly recording his friends outside when they are racing, or playing fortnite lol
customer_reviews.author: Tempestt

customer_reviews.title: Works great, then falls apart.
customer_reviews.text: Great product in function but not in quality! Exceeded our expectation for my 7 yr old just long enough for her to fall in love with it before it fell apart. The charger stopped charging completely, screen messed up, functions froze then battery won’t charge at all. Less than 7 months old and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of "app" options loaded onto watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 5 yr old who loves my Apple watch. It has a lot of features Camera, Video, alarm, stop watch, games and even an exercise option that calculates jumps and steps. It cannot call or text, but I didn't see that being a necessary feature at this age.
customer_reviews.author: JBagley

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable item.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months, the screen got black. The watch is not working. I contacted vtech, and haven't received a reply to apply warranty. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Takes pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present and the kid loves it! He is 5 and it is perfect for him. He loves the picture option and games.
customer_reviews.author: firewife

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it very much! She wanted a watch similar to an apple watch that I have. Since she's only 3 years old I wanted her to have one that would be fun and entertaining but also appropriate for kids! She loves to play the games and keeps her active!
customer_reviews.author: Janella Bejer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for our grandson's 6th birthday.
customer_reviews.text: Sister got one for her birthday, so brother had to have one! That's okay, because they were both thrilled. These Kidizoom watches are a bit pricey, but they seem very well made and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Doterling

customer_reviews.title: Very cool 😎
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old loves it! He has had it for a few months now & still has not gotten tired of it. It has cute games, sounds & screens.
customer_reviews.author: Roya Shirani

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old absolutely loves this! There is tons of features and things to do and it doesnt need to connect to wifi, so it's great for car rides, or grocery shopping! Plus my daughter now feels tech savy and oh so cool! Haha. She is tall and slim and it fits her wrist perfectly on the smallest notch. I really cant rave about it enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sherman

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old figure it out
customer_reviews.text: I did not pay attention to the age group of this product before purchasing it for my 2 year old Christmas gift. But some way some how she figure out how do work every function on her own. I am very pleased with my order thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Jaleesa

customer_reviews.title: super birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter absolutely loved this watch. One week later she is still snapping pictures and counting her steps. Super gift.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Molly

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the reviews indicated
customer_reviews.text: The screen resolution is low and look so cheap. I bought two and returned both back as one of the touch screen stopped responding touch commands. I am not sure why this watch gets such a good review.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ercan

customer_reviews.title: Short term fun, with cheap band.
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo daughter wanted one for her birthday. Luckily, it came with an extra band as the first one broke in the first 72 hours. She used it a lot for the first week or 2, then lost total interest in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Fun as well as educational
customer_reviews.text: A "smart watch" for kids. Encourages activity, telling time (analog as well as digital) and other games Great little watch I have bought both my granddaughters this watch. They both love it.
customer_reviews.author: olderchick

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old grandson Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for our 4 year old grandson. He absolutely Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Band is garbage. Pocket watch at best.
customer_reviews.text: Band no longer stays attached to the watch after less than 6 months. Don’t buy this unless you want a pocket watch.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I got this for my 10 year old. She loved it. Although, it eventually got old and all the games became easy and she said they were boring.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Family

customer_reviews.title: Could be better for sure
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with, need a computer to download games at a pricey fee, kept my son busy for a day then got old quick. Hes five years old and not much to do. Battery life great as long as your not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas and she loved it. I was going to buy this at Best Buy but apparently they do not sell the DX2 in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun for my 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for my 6 year old! She thinks it's just like my Apple watch, and in may ways, boy they are alike. She loves taking pictures and videos on it and even playing her tunes. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ChefP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves her watch. It’s teaching her to tell time and she loves the two cameras. She won’t stop calling it Siri though.
customer_reviews.author: helllooonurse81

customer_reviews.title: The strap broke barely used
customer_reviews.text: The strap is very week . My 7 year old broke it within a week in a spot that the entire watch would have to be replaced . Because it’s a metal piece that’s part of the watch face . Very disappointed. It was a Christmas gift .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stop working in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Hope it lasts a long time which I expect based on review. will update review in a year. However watch stopped working in less than year.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with second band as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried the watch yet since this is a Christmas gift, however we picked this watch because it was advertised with a second flora band, and this was not included with the watch we received.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Cute idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas gift for 6 year old girl, she played with it for a week and got bored with it. May be better suited for kids a little older
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy 5yr old
customer_reviews.text: She absolutely loves this watch, wears it everywhere. The screen is not as tough as we'd hope it would be since it's for children. She's already managed to crack it, still works though.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for GRANDDAUGHTER. She loves it, plays games on it. Very user friendly. It Does keep losing the correct time so I have to reset it in settings but it is simple to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My nice loves her watch because she can take pictures and ...
customer_reviews.text: My nice loves her watch because she can take pictures and use the pedometer with her sister they both have one they love it also the games and learning to tell time and to record on them
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa frasier

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 9 year old. Played with it for 3 days 🙃 not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Haq

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two weeks-but replacement was easy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my 5yr old and 7yr old for Christmas. One of the watches froze within two weeks. I found the return/replacement process simple, and the replacement is working fine, about two months later. The kids love the games and the ability to take pictures. They are very cute. Need to be charged daily if the child wears it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: lmsf

customer_reviews.title: A must have for young children
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for any young child. Second one I bought both children love them. Don't buy a cheap look a like spend the money and buy this one they are worth every penny. My grandkid grandkids wear them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this watch, and has had a lot of fun with it. However it has broken in 2 places after only 2 weeks. I contacted the company and there are no replacement parts available.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great color. Probably not the strongest of materials if there is a lot of roughness with watch on or in the oitdoors
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch but not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old daughter for Christmas. She played with it initially, but got bored very quickly and has barely touched it since the initial excitement wore off.
customer_reviews.author: akiner

customer_reviews.title: Way more than I could imagine
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome! My son wanted a watch like mine, I have a Fitbit. This watch does so many things. He loves it. Haven't had any issues. I have recommended it to several people I know.
customer_reviews.author: Robi S.

customer_reviews.title: “Dead” spots?
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months the video and photo button no longer works! It was such a huge selling feature!

customer_reviews.title: i was worried that she might think think the games were too easy or she might get bored with it quickly but ...
customer_reviews.text: gave this as a christmas gift to my 8yo daughter. i was worried that she might think think the games were too easy or she might get bored with it quickly but she loves it! the camera has filters similar to snapchat and she loves that since i dont like her using snapchat on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great little watch for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 5 year old for Christmas and she loves it. It can take pictures as well as selfies with its dual camera mode. Record voice and play games. I'm sure it can do much more but we haven't tested it all of it. Hold a charge for a good amount of time and fits on tiny wrist as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The telling of time and taking pictures
customer_reviews.text: The children love the Vtect edition watch. They learn fast to tell the time and set it. Also they love taking by pictures and recording stuff. It is really a great watch. They also love the games
customer_reviews.author: Agnes V Evand

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my son as a birthday gift. He loves taking pictures and videos with it! He's using it to help him learn how to tell time. Great gift for ages 6 to 8.

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHRISTMAS PRESENT FROM GRAMMY!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old grandson for Christmas and I don't think he's taken it off since.. it takes very clear pictures and videos and he loves the games.. definitely recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: VLC

customer_reviews.title: My six year old wanted this for Christmas. He ...
customer_reviews.text: My six year old wanted this for Christmas. He played with it for about a week and now it sits in a drawer.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My daughter wears it everywhere. Didn’t come with the wall charger part but did come with cable. A little inconvenient but that’s the only issues we’ve had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Guevarra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I liked the discounted price and that I received the watch a day after ordering it. I purchased it for my 8 yr old granddaughter, she is ecstatic with it. Great experience.

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level digital watch for K to 2nd grade.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it! Quick setup and easy to use. Great entry level watch for 5-8 y/o. They love the fitness games and running around until they met their goal.

customer_reviews.title: Make that toddler feel like a big kid!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for our 4 y/o granddaughter. She loves it and feels like the big kids with a way to take pictures and videos. She figured most everything out on her own and works it better than I can!

customer_reviews.title: Band breaks easily, no replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, poorly made bands. The plastic clips on the bands break very easily, cannot find a replacement. Came with 2 bands, both broke within a month. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved his gift.
customer_reviews.text: I assume this was a good purchase since it was requested by my nephew and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sarno

product_meta.title: VTech KidiZoom Smartwatch DX2 Special Edition Floral Birds with Bonus Vivid Violet Wristband
product_meta.description: Features two cameras that allow your child to capture everything from action video to selfies. Then play games and tell time with customizable clock faces! customize watch faces with photo clock faces Maker choose between 55 digital and analog watch faces or customize the watch face by using pictures and selfies. Explore your creativity with fun photo effects, stamps, frames and filters. Parental control allows you to disable games or set a daily time limit for your Kidizoom Smartwatch DX2. Tap on the clock or the owl to hear the time spoken. The owl tells you the time in both analog and digital modes. Touch screen. Rechargeable battery, voice changer, photo and video effects, motion apps, time apps, games, splash proof for everyday play.
feature_bullets: Two cameras allow you to take videos, pictures and selfies that can be customized and made into new watch faces. This online special edition comes with 2 changeable wristbands, one in special design and the other in Vivid Violet. Easy wristband change in 3 steps!

Helps kids learn to tell time with 55 digital and Analog watch faces that they can customize; splash proof for everyday play, splash and sweat proof; do not submerge and not suitable for showering or bathing
Monster catcher game creates an augmented reality gaming experience where you can capture monsters in the real world

Includes a motion sensor for active play challenges, a pedometer to count your steps and fun sound effects, features a parental controls setting to limit the play time. Product Dimensions: 8.9" x 1.8" x 0.7"

Using the included Micro-USB cable, upload photos and videos, recharge the battery and download extra free content like games and Seasonal clock faces from vtech's learning lodge DX2 is intended for ages 4 to 12 years. Changeable wristband works only with special edition with changeable wristband. Online special edition with changeable wristband is also available in royal blue; other online exclusive colors for single non-changeable wristband are also available in pink, camouflage and black.
